1151.content:
Alright, it's been a strange, hectic time on the You vs Who storyboards. Here is a little history for anyone who doesn't know.

Gassy Horse owns the stories.

I, Gassy Skunk, challenged Gassy Horse once in a servitude fight, we both tried our best, but because I knew the rules well, I was able to manipulate the game into my favor. Therefore since Gassy Horse lost, he is my servant.

However he did not want to take part in this, but he has been banning people from the storyboard, and not allowing them to finish their stories, and not finishing the ongoing fights he had with them..
To mitigate this I struck a deal with them. As of today, now, all members who were banned from this story line are un-banned.
I will be notifying them of this post.

I have offered to gift Gassy Horse, paid membership, the best package, if he unbans everyone, and can take 30 rounds of sluggishness, while on top of having to do anything, any fighter here tells them to do, again, for 30 chapters. If he taps out, everyone will be offered one chapter to add humiliation before the storyline is finished, and Gassy will not get paid membership, (Try your best to humiliate them into defeat.) Anyone can post here, I encourage you to add your commands to the next chapter option if you need to, as in

Option 1: Do this and that
Option 2: Do this and that instead, which is equally as bad, but you do as we say so you have no choice but to do one or the other.

Add as many chapters/options as you want, until 30 chapters has been reached in one line, Gassy is not allowed to fight back, for now, the anthro Horse is tied to the corner of the ring and gagged, so make your grand entry and really let your characters shine here, hopefully nobody will respect Gassy Horse after this and they will learn a lesson about banning people. Feel free to also add multiple posts as different characters/anthros.

Gassy has been ordered to reply, to EACH and EVERY chapter, until ONE of them reaches 30 chapters, so avoid the 30 chapter limit if you can, reaching 30 chapters means Gassy no longer is sluggish, and can fight all of you at once.

Most of all, have fun, and enjoy yourself.

121.content:
Name: Alex (Call him "Al" to really annoy him)

Species: Skunk-Human Hybrid

Gender: Male

Well, here I am. A mix of the bushy tail and white stripe of a skunk, with the physical features of a human. I am Alex, A failed experiment from the government, set out into the world to test if hybrids can exist in the real world. I'm 13 years old, and in school everyone stayed away from me as a result of my...defect, if you will. This caused me to become a bit psychotic whenever someone ignores me. As a skunk I can spray at will, although only once every few matches: it needs to fuel up, after all. My main weapons are my speed, and my horrendous farts and feet. Although...no one really smells my feet unless I take my shoes off, which is a good thing for them, cause they REEK! Let's see how I can do fighting other hybrids and species...

Feet: Ungodly, but only when I take my shoes off. They're scentless if I have my shoes on.
Farts: Ungodly. What do you expect, I'm a skunk hybrid!
Body Musk: Very bad. I never shower because I gave up after realizing no matter how much I shower, the stench never goes away.
Breath: Okay. I brush my teeth regularly, so what?

Stink resistance: 60 out of 100. Strangely enough, with all the smells emanating off of me, my nose is still fairly sensitive.

Special abilities:

Musky Farts: My farts already have the faint scent of skunk musk, but when I choose to, I can fart out a misty mix of my musk and my farts, a true double assault.

Speedy Speedster: I used to be on the track team In school, and I usually won...maybe because it was because of my smell...but anyways, I can run circles around my opponent as long as they aren't fast.
121.title: Alex the Human-Skunk Hybrid

13531.content:
First I will post my stats.
Name: (nickname) Gassy
Species: Rapidash
Gender: Unspecified

I am a large Rapidash, however since my training, I have nearly mutated into an unrecognizable form of my species.. I use my overwhelming strength and muscle mass, specifically in my hind legs, to over power my enemies and force them into a corner, where typically they tap out after a few humiliating farts to their face convinces them that they are no match for me. At least that was my original description… I have been a slave to a champion since I lost a battle to them and they have trained me in stink resistance, and have been the cause of my mutations, I have disappeared for a while during this and almost became a legend, though specific champions do tell of my existence; though not outside of my masters fart chambers… During this training my flames have turned a bright green tint, I have learned finer control of my flames and have developed new strategies on how to use it… I am no champion yet, however I have stats nearly similar now.

Feet: Pretty Bad, as hooves pick up little debris off the ground, however powerful knockout weapons.
Farts: Unbearable, but high volume due to the nature of my large size.
Body Musk: Unbearable, as I have not had a wash in a very long time.
Butt: Between Unbearable and Ungodly, as a slave I was not permitted to wash as a part of my training, it did not go so well for my scent.
Breath: Ungodly, I brush regularly, but do not use toothpaste as it is a figment of the liberal media to convince us to buy useless appliances and pastes. I have taken much stink to the mouth through my mistresses training, it has caused my breath to be nearly as bad as her farts.
Stink Resistance: 67/100, as I am a horse, I have a rather large nose and my nostrils run deep, so I am sensitive to smells, however my mindset and my will at any moment can cause my actual resistance to be much higher, as I am a muscle bound horse, I am not likely to put up with stink, or being humiliated for too long before a special ability kicks in, my stink resistance has went up over 40 points since I lost to my master and have been trained by them, however I do not deal with stinks too well.

Special Abilities:
Hysterical Strength
Hysterical Strength I cannot control, it happens during a fight or flight response, such as moments of fear, or moments of extreme rage, being humiliated, especially by an enemies butt, increases the chances of this occurring. My strength is increased 3 fold as my brain allows control of entire muscles, as to the standard 33%, but enough science. At this point I can usually break out of any bounds or holds that may be frustrating me, or overpower my foes, it all depends on the variables of the engagement however. If I am unable to break free, this ability looks more like a big hissy fit and I imagine would be amusing, however I have never had this ability let me down.

Incineration
I concentrate my gas to use my burning tail to let out a rancid flaming fart, the damage dealt depends on the foe I am facing and their defence against flame. This ability takes a while to build up, as currently my gas is not concentrated enough to burn unless I have had time to concentrate it. Which also means I cannot use this move for at least 3 turns after farting.

Fire Breath

After being exposed to much stink training at the hands of my master, my breath has become so foul that by utilizing my flame control; I am able to ignite it and cause a stream of green flames, I can use this to take down aerial targets as I hit them from afar and singe their feathers, disabling flight; or to melt incoming ice attacks and humidify incoming water attacks.

NEW ABILITY: SIZE CONTROL

After tinkering with the inner workings of a Poke’ball, and some horrible failures which were barely recovered from, I figured out how to adjust the inner workings of a Poke’ball, specifically the mechanism that controls the size of a creature it is trying to absorb or expel. In doing so, I have figured out how to use it, at a short distance, to increase or decrease my own size, or that of my opponents.

-----------------------------


I enter the ring and moon my foe immediately "Why don't you come kiss my butt, you've already lost, just submit and admit defeat" I say giving my ass three good slaps.

This ability takes a while to build up, as currently my gas is not concentrated enough to burn unless I have had time to concentrate it. Fire Breath

After being exposed to much stink training at the hands of my master, my breath has become so foul that by utilizing my flame control; I am able to ignite it and cause a stream of green flames, I can use this to take down aerial targets as I hit them from afar and singe their feathers, disabling flight; or to melt incoming ice attacks and humidify incoming water attacks.

Name: (nickname) Gassy
Species: Rapidash
Gender: Unspecified

I am a large Rapidash, however since my training, I have nearly mutated into an unrecognizable form of my species.. I use my overwhelming strength and muscle mass, specifically in my hind legs, to over power my enemies and force them into a corner, where typically they tap out after a few humiliating farts to their face convinces them that they are no match for me. Feet: Pretty Bad, as hooves pick up little debris off the ground, however powerful knockout weapons.
Farts: Unbearable, but high volume due to the nature of my large size.

Hysterical Strength
Hysterical Strength I cannot control, it happens during a fight or flight response, such as moments of fear, or moments of extreme rage, being humiliated, especially by an enemies butt, increases the chances of this occurring. My strength is increased 3 fold as my brain allows control of entire muscles, as to the standard 33%, but enough science. At this point I can usually break out of any bounds or holds that may be frustrating me, or overpower my foes, it all depends on the variables of the engagement however. If I am unable to break free, this ability looks more like a big hissy fit and I imagine would be amusing, however I have never had this ability let me down.

Incineration
I concentrate my gas to use my burning tail to let out a rancid flaming fart, the damage dealt depends on the foe I am facing and their defence against flame. This ability takes a while to build up, as currently my gas is not concentrated enough to burn unless I have had time to concentrate it. Which also means I cannot use this move for at least 3 turns after farting.

Fire Breath

After being exposed to much stink training at the hands of my master, my breath has become so foul that by utilizing my flame control; I am able to ignite it and cause a stream of green flames, I can use this to take down aerial targets as I hit them from afar and singe their feathers, disabling flight; or to melt incoming ice attacks and humidify incoming water attacks.

NEW ABILITY: SIZE CONTROL

After tinkering with the inner workings of a Poke’ball, and some horrible failures which were barely recovered from, I figured out how to adjust the inner workings of a Poke’ball, specifically the mechanism that controls the size of a creature it is trying to absorb or expel. In doing so, I have figured out how to use it, at a short distance, to increase or decrease my own size, or that of my opponents.

Fire Breath

After being exposed to much stink training at the hands of my master, my breath has become so foul that by utilizing my flame control; I am able to ignite it and cause a stream of green flames, I can use this to take down aerial targets as I hit them from afar and singe their feathers, disabling flight; or to melt incoming ice attacks and humidify incoming water attacks.

155231.content:
Character overview:

Appearance- Vile resembles a freakishly tall and thin human with elongated, webbed fingers and toes. Each of these fingers and toes is adorned with a long and thick, but hollow claw that ends in a beveled point. His body oozes a thick, rancid-looking fluid, primarily from his mouth and off of a several foot long tongue, much too big for anything humanoid, but also concentrated in the areas around his hands, feet, armpits, ass, and groin. His skin is sickly pale with an eerie green hue and it always has a faint sheen as if moist or oily.

Height- 8 feet tall, usually hunched with knees bent, bringing him down to a much more modest six and a half feet high.

Weight - despite his height, Vile is remarkably light weight. His durable, lightweight skeleton keeps him at around 150 pounds. He's easy to toss around, but heavy blows do very little unless hes pinned against another solid surface. He's taken a lot of punishment, but never broke a bone to date. Unfortuna

Abilities and tactics: Vile's body is covered in a slick, oily substance that prevents the thick sludge that he excretes from sticking to himself.

Vile constantly secretes a toxic sludge from his body that rapidly causes a powerful physical dependence in his victims. It can effectively make its way into his victim's system through the skin, via mucous membranes, intravenously, or even via digestion. This toxin is secreted from Vile's sweat glands, his hollow claws, and ducts located in the back of his mouth. It's thick, almost mucousy in texture, and adheres to most surfaces. Its scent is every bit as thick as the substance itself; putrid and cloying with undertones of unwashed musk. When freshly secreted, it's thick and sticky. This makes it extremely useful for holding opponents in place while slowly working its way through their skin and into their body.

Due to Vile's near constant exposure to this toxin, it takes monumentous dosages for him to feel any effect. Should it get to him, he displays the same symptoms as his victims. Body temperature rises, sense of touch becomes heightened, heart rate increases and the mind becomes foggy, pliable, and more open to suggestion. As the body burns through the vile ooze, it leaves behind symptoms of terrible withdrawal: cold sweats, unbearable aches, exhaustion, and in extreme cases may result in loss of consciousness or death if the victim does not give in to their need for more.

In short, Vile wants a long fight. The more venom he can secrete, the more control he has over the arena, and the more likely it is the toxins will take effect. At a distance, Vile doesn't have many options. To cover for this, he wants to coat the arena in toxin to slow down his opponent and close the gap. In a cage match, that's less of a problem, Should Vile get the upper hand and stagger his opponent, he's going to ensure they're going stay still by coating them in sludge, and pump them full of toxin until they all but forget who they are and even the slightest touch feels like a blow from a sledge hammer.

Vile's never been one to show mercy and revels in others' pain. Be careful, and good luck.

155332.content:
Name: Harriet
Species: Hyena
Gender: Female

Background/Description: An imposing hyena fighter, standing at nine feet in height. Harriet is a fairly chubby hyena woman with huge medicine-ball breasts, a massive gut, tree-trunk-like limbs and a couch-sized rump. She puts the huge in HUGE! But she couldn’t do it alone, thanks to the hundreds of innocent people she’s eaten over the years she’s been able to cultivate this incredible figure. She has a particular taste for humans, being her favorite food, but she’ll eat anyone. She’s even gotten in trouble in the past, diving into a crowd of people after winning a wrestling match and devouring screaming fans left and right. She has very little regard for others, even basic wrestling rules. She also is quite a slob, seeing no need in bathing, she’s cultivated a near-toxic level of stink that has made her matches incredibly easy and slanted in her favor. With such powerful stink she basically steps into the ring with an advantage and having bathed in her own nastiness for decades, she’s essentially impervious to others stink attacks or grossness. She strikes fear in the hearts of men and women, human and anthro, fighter and civilian alike. In some cases, fighters would just not show up to their match with her out of fear… luckily for her, she always found their home address and would pay them a visit to have a ‘dinner date’ together. Being a notorious loose canon and nigh-unbeatable fighter, Harriet has quite the reputation.

Feet: Most of Harriet’s body is ‘ungodly’ levels of disgusting. Her foot paws are no exception. Her paws are large and unwashed, coated in dirt, sweat and fungus, and between her toes is toe jam so fowl its sent opponents to the ER on occasion.

Farts: Harriet has a steady diet of garbage, junk, trash… and the occasional human. This toxic combination of food stuffs and random objects makes her farts incredibly potent. Her farts typically emit thick, green, chunky clouds that her opponents can choke and gag on.

Body Musk: Harriet doesn’t even know what the word ‘hygiene’ even means, and she hasn’t taken a shower in decades. Her B.O. as even made some of her fellow gross anthros tear-up at her odor. For weaker opponents, simply being within her vicinity can turn their stomach, from greasy fur to sweaty pits, Harriet knows how to keep her body disgusting.

Butt: Being a fairly chubby and curvy lady on the heavy set side, Harriet loves to trap opponents underneath or inside of her butt. Having a butt the size of a large couch makes that pretty easy. As unwashed and unkempt as the rest of her, Harriet’s ass can destroy an opponents sense of smell, and the hyena loves to revel in squashing her opponents ‘pancake-flat’ beneath it. And if she’s feeling creative, she’ll trap them in her butt crack and take them home with her as a prize… but her unluckiest of opponents get to be devoured by her hefty ass.

Breath: Due to her disgusting in-take of everything from junk food to actual garbage from the dumpster, Harriet’s breath has been known to drive opponents up the wall. Her breath can typically be characterized as a scent of rotting fish, mixed with spoiled milk and fertilizer.

Stink Resistance: Considering Harriet is a walking stink-factory, she has also built up a total resistance to fowl scents, giving her a 100/100 ration. Legends say she’s lost her sense of smell, but she has no problem sniffing out opponents or just regular people she wants to eat, she’s simply impervious to disgusting smells.

Special Abilities
Bottomless Stomach - One drawback to Harriet is that unlike other fighters she doesn’t have many special abilities or anything one would really regard as a super power. But aside from her inability to smell disgusting scents… one other ability that does give her a leg up is her bottomless stomach. Harriet has eaten and stuffed down squirming victim after screaming weakling and has never gotten full. She’s tested the parameters of her belly time and time again, at one point swallowing a whole wrestling stadium’s worth of frightened, fleeing fans… and still her belly remained strong and churned them all up into body fat. Whether she’s fighting a team of fighters or just feels peakish after a match, Harriet’s belly will be sure to handle anything and everyone she gulps down into it.

Humiliation VS Strikeout: Being the monstrous predator that she is Harriet typically goes for Strikeout matches and avoids Humiliation matches… but there have been times in the past where the Ref or her opponent has been able to verbally convince her to doing a Humiliation round instead.

So… who will be the first sucker to take on the Harrowing, Horrifying, Hungry Harriet!?
155332.title: Harriet the Hyena

Vance is a black jackrabbit. He's 5'8", with an athletic frame. He's trained all of his life as a capoeirista. His unorthodox movements and acrobatic ability have made him a strong contender in other tournaments and leagues. Some say capoeira is a dead martial art, Vance has trained hard to prove the nay-sayers wrong. He competes with a sense of honor that has earned the respect of many of his opponents.

Scent Information:

Feet -- Vance aims to bathe at least daily and maintains his hygiene to the best of his ability. He also works out obsessively, and has been known to skip a day here or there. On bad days, his foot wraps, or sleeves collect his sweat and other grime from underfoot to become fairly potent. Vance tends to favor wraps or toeless socks that have served him well in the training leading up to the main event. His preference for wearing the same, "lucky socks" for days on end can lead to scents that are somewhere between unpleasant and vile during a fight, depending on how much he's exerted himself. After matches, resumes standard cleaning/bathing routines and they are fairly tame.

Farts -- Vance has never considered using farts as a weapon, nor has he been subject to an opponent who does.

Body Musk -- At the end of hard days of training, the rabbit sweats heavily, perhaps he can even smell himself, something he's always used to note a job well done before showering off the next day. In a fight, Unpleasant to overwhelming, depending on exertion. Tame otherwise.

Butt -- Vance's ass smells like an ass. It's not pleasant, but he takes special care to clean well each and every time he showers.

Breath -- The rabbit brushes three times a day and eats mostly plants. His breath is slightly minty, sometimes taking on the scent of any herbs he may have been chewing on.

Stink Resistance -- 30?/100. Vance is not used to being exposed to any scent that could have in any way been a danger to a person. He probably won't take it well, but the scents of training partners or opponents have never bothered him in the past.


Abilities:

Athletic -- Vance is extremely fit, in a fight he keeps going, and going, and going....

Powerful Legs -- The rabbit's legs are his most dangerous feature. They allow him to bound quickly about the ring and kick with more force than someone his size should be able to muster. His fighting relies on this!

Tangled Webs -- Vance lays plans within plans, thinking three moves out during his fights. He's by no means slow to adapt when they go awry, but if he can't get a read on someone's style/plans, he is forced to fight on reflex which is much more uncomfortable.

As I see the rabbit, entering in the ring I can not hide a smille, as my nose did not recoil from any rotten source of smell... Surely he seems pretty fit, but muscle are not the only thing that matter in the arena and often force is not enough to bend opponent to yor will...

I never see him near this arena, maybe is a newbie... Let's try to frighten him...

" Well well well, what did we have here ? Hi my little Rabbit, ready to get your assk kicked ?" I said starting to stretch and flexing my muscle " Or You could spare yourself from any further humiliations and surrender me now... Drop on your knees and crawl to kiss my butt, maybe later I will not make you clean my cat litter with your mouth.... Maybe " I add, laughing and turning to give you a view of my bubbly butt, as I look you over my shoulder
155333221.title: Begin the match!

choices: Use the rabbit's honor to your advantage.
1553332212.content:
I bounce about in my corner to keep my body limber, nervous and excited for my premier fight with this organization.

I'm used to fights beginning with a touching of gloves, a bow, a song, or prayer; some mutual gesture of respect. When you offer me the opportunity to debase myself in front of a live audience, it's hard to contain my disgust.

If this cat's plan for me is what he says it is, the solution is simple -- do not lose.

I eye the cat across the ring carefully to see if I'm missing something. He's lean and seems quick, but the thing that gets to me the most is the look in his eyes. He seems dead serious. He expects me to give in.

When he turns to show me his ass, staring me down over his shoulder, I barely hold on to my composure. I stop my bouncing and squeeze my hands into tightly balled fists.

The bell rings.

There was one good thing about being told to crawl over and kiss his ass; he was waiting for me to get things started. I take a calming breath, resume my footwork and approach the center of the ring.

I hold my leading hand out in a gesture of goodwill, waiting for the cat to touch his fist to mine. As I approach, the powerful scent of your unwashed musk registers in my nose. I wrinkle my face involuntarily, but manage not to cough or cover my nose. In spite of my brief lapse, I relax my facial features and wait.

Despite your earlier transgressions, I want to start this fight honorably.
1553332212.title: Good luck, may the best win.

info.brief_description: There used to be a very popular story titled You vs Who, honor your characters in battle!
info.description:
REMEMBER: WINNERS TAKE DUMPS, LOSERS EAT IT.
That little motto should be a reminder that this fight-thread is nearly no holds barred, almost anything is allowed.

***FREE MEMBERSHIP RAFFLE!!! INFO BELOW***
To any furry/anthro Skunk fighters or fighters who sign up and create a skunk character, and directly attempts to defeat myself, will be entered into a raffle in which once there are enough, say 5 or so, I will put the cruelest, toughest and hard fighting stinky authors into a raffle for a 1 year membership!
ALL SKUNK-HYBRID ENTRIES ARE GUARANTEED 3 MONTHS GIFTED MEMBERSHIP IF THEY WIN THEIR FIGHT.

------------------
This is a revival of the You vs Who story, as such the rules will remain the same as they were. With some adjustments, they are as follows.

Skunk characters will be given a few extra slots at the beginning as they were the most popular characters in the previous series.



--------PLEASE READ ENTIRE INTRODUCTION-------


--- EDIT 2012, BELOW RULES NO LONGER HAVE TO BE FOLLOWED FULLY, If you wish me to step in, send a message; as for now I have decided to let the story go wherever the writers wish, I claim no responsibility for material posted however if one wishes it be removed, I can arrange that, have fun. -----------




There will be many introductory blanks, to see recent posts, click that, if you cannot find new competitor then create your character and wait.

If you are signing on to fight somone who has already posted their character, you CAN NOT make your character stronger than theirs, you must be equal or less, unless otherwise stated in the first poster's chapter.

Rules are; Can either be a Humiliation Match or Strikeout, if you want to chose both, copy and paste your charachters details under both categories.
-Humiliation matches are the only matches you are allowed to give up. However the looser has to do three things the winner demands. Try not to put your character to shame.
-REFEREE: I will be the Referee of all matches, I will respond quickly, if I do not respond within 2 days of a needed response then all rules are forfeit and anything goes. I can be hurt/knocked out, any pins that take place while I am unconscious do not count and are just for the humiliation. When I am unconscious it lasts 5 chapters from the Writer who knocked me out's perspective, so a total of four.
Threatening the Ref to pull things in your direction is encouraged however can only happen if the Ref has declared your enemy to be in the Sluggish Status(Explained Later) for two chapters, if you harass/humiliate/threaten the Ref, your enemy cannot defend him for 3 of your own chapters. My giving in will be judged solely on your writing style, techniques, how bad the consequences for not giving in will be, my own dignity, and like or dislike of writer, so in a nutshell messing with me is a risky move but, you can demand I declare you a winner and if you got me to agree the opponent should be in a sluggish status already then this is your best bet probably. You both can try to get me to give in at the same time, if you fight me I will fight back for how much my character can, you can team up against me and see who I declare winner or call a round two, or anything else you might wanna ask the Ref.

-SLUGGISHNESS; If you as a writer believe your enemy should be senseless and weak due to multiple chapters of heavy pounding, message me, and if you are technically correct for how they really would be feeling, I will decide on allowing them to go into a one to two chapter sluggishness, where all of their attempts to fight can be easily countered, and they are practically defenseless, however can still kick out, except kick out response time is decreased to 2 chapturs of your post with a pin in it. (this is the status your enemy must be in before you can try to humiliate or threaten them into taking your orders.)

-Location; can be anywhere the first poster chooses, the I as the Referee will always be there though.
-NO SELF-DECLARED WINS. If you pin somone, they have a time limit in which they must respond or else they loose, this time limit must be at least two hours. Time things right, everyone sleeps. If one person is already being owned but keeps kicking out, I will declare a winner myself.
-TRY TO WIN. Please create your favorite character and try to win, you shall face other winning competitors or a newbie if you have a win under your belt already. Do not write with intent of loosing.
-Fight for at least 3 to 5 chapters before trying to end the match.
-The readers choices must have at least one where they are allowed to make their own moves to escape yours(Readers Choice). The others are up to the writer of that chapter.
-If a writer successfully kicks out twice, the pinner will have to do one command by the ex-pinned until they can keep fighting. This is to encourage timing your pins well and to contain access pinning. These commands cannot cause the commander to win.
-ABILITIES: Your character can have any abilities they choose, be aware of the first writer's abilities, and be sure to make your own to counter them. If an ability is not stated in the intro page, it cannot be added, unless you win a fight, if you win, you will be allowed to add an ability and also modify your character slightly. Abilities can hender opponents if not properly countered, KO abilities cannot KO enemies unless they do not reply within a time limit of at least one and a half hours or more if you set a time limit after using a KO ability.

Put up your bio, battle choices, and wait for people to battle you!
Don't be afraid ^-^!

I encourage Dragons and Anthros, Furries, etc any species goes as long as it is not too rediculas, like a puddle or any non living stationary object... Except a virus... Other than that u mus b living. Virus vs Germ.. What kind of virus is made to target bacteria?! hmm.

Have fun and make your character Pwn the intarwebsz challengers!
